TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ControlParser extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供满足以下条件的方法：用于根据表示持久性控件或模板的标记的字符串来创建 Web 服务器 控件或 接口。

span.span: Provides methods for creating a Web server control or interface from a string of markup that represents a persisted control or template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser 类提供的方法可以通过分析表示控件或控件模板的标记的字符串来创建 "The T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser class provides methods that can create a T:System.Web.UI.Control control or T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate interface by parsing a string of markup representing a control or control template. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类获取页面上的控件的 HTML 标记 ，以及如何使用类实例化控件中的控件 。The following code example shows how to get the HTML markup for a control on a page using the class and how to instantiate a control from it using the class. 该示例还演示如何从设计器显示 Microsoft Windows 对话框。The example also shows how to display Microsoft Windows dialog boxes from a designer. [!code-cpp[ControlParserPersisterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlParserPersisterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlParserPersisterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#1)]

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

summary.span: 根据指定的标记创建控件。

span.span: Creates a control from the specified markup.
Extending Design-Time Support

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

span.span: An instance that is the designer host for the page.
The HTML markup for the control.

summary.span: 使用指定的设计器宿主，根据指定的标记创建控件。

span.span: Creates a control from the specified markup using the specified designer host.

returns.span: *controlText* 表示的 ；否则，如果分析器无法生成控件，则为 。

span.span: The that *controlText* represents; otherwise, , if the parser cannot build the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用设计器宿主的服务在 ASP.NET 网页上访问表示 register 指令的字符串。The method accesses the string representing the register directives on the ASP.NET Web page using the services of the designer host. 设计器宿主服务通过对象的 属性获取 ，如果该服务不可用，则通过该 服务获取。Designer host services are acquired through the property of the object, or if that is not available, the service. 如果分析器无法生成控件，则该方法将引发异常。The method throws an exception if the parser cannot build the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 HTML 标记文本创建控件。The following code example shows how to create a control from HTML markup text. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[ControlParserPersisterExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ControlParserPersisterExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ControlParserPersisterExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#2)]

span.span: A parameter is not valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用设计器宿主的服务在 ASP.NET 网页上访问表示 register 指令的字符串。The method accesses the string representing the register directives on the ASP.NET Web page using the services of the designer host. 设计器宿主服务通过对象的 属性获取 ，如果该服务不可用，则通过该 服务获取。Designer host services are acquired through the property of the object, or if that is not available, the service. 如果分析器无法生成控件，则该方法将引发异常。The method throws an exception if the parser cannot build the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 HTML 标记文本创建控件。The following code example shows how to create a control from HTML markup text. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: An instance that is the designer host for the page.

span.span: A string that represents a collection of markup for controls.

summary.span: 使用指定的设计器宿主，根据指定的标记创建控件的数组。

span.span: Creates an array of controls from the specified markup using the specified designer host.

returns.span: 从 分析得出的 元素的数组；否则，如果分析器无法生成控件，则为 。

span.span: An array of elements, parsed from ; otherwise, , if the parser cannot build the controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用设计器宿主的服务在 ASP.NET 网页上访问表示 register 指令的字符串。The method accesses the string representing the register directives on the ASP.NET Web page using the services of the designer host. 设计器宿主服务通过对象的 属性获取 ，如果该服务不可用，则通过该 服务获取。Designer host services are acquired through the property of the object, or if that is not available, the service. 如果分析器无法生成参数中的控件，则该方法将引发异常 `controlText` 。The method throws an exception if the parser cannot build the controls from the `controlText` parameter.

span.span: is .
-or-
is or an empty string ("").
